title: San Antonio Missions National Historical Park: Books for Children & Educators
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore     Books for Children & Educators              Books for Children & Educators       Educators All certified Educators, regardless of state or country of residence, can receive a 15% discount on all purchases at the Park Store. Additionally, non-profit educational facilities do not pay sales tax. Please contact the Bookstore for more information concerning available books.         Gente de Razón: People of Reason, CD, Spanish sub-titles, WNPA 1998, 2005         The Native Americans of Texas by Grace Stamper;Hendrick-Long Publishing Company 2006         Rangers - Activity & Sticker Book by Greer Chesher; Ill. by Guy Portirio; Eastern Parks & Monuments Association 2005.         Spain and the American Revolution, Editor Meg Chorlian;Cobblestone Publishing Company, November 2000         Voices from Colonial America: Texas 1727-1836 by Michael Teitelbaum;National Geographic 2005
